mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( USER_ID, CATEGORY_ID, SOLD, NAME, PRICE, VIEW_COUNT, SELL_COUNT, DESC, THUMBNAIL_URL ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{sold}, #{name}, #{price}, #{viewCount}, #{desc}, #{sellCount}, #{thumbnailUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, CATEGORY_ID, SOLD, NAME, PRICE, VIEW_COUNT, SELL_COUNT, DESC, THUMBNAIL_URL FRST_REG_DATE, FRST_REG_USER_ID, LAST_CHG_DATE, LAST_CHG_USER_ID FROM PRODUCT
